title: Dictionary Methods Practice
instructions: Practice using dictionary methods like keys(), values(), items(), update(), pop(), and setdefault().
hints: Iterate over items() to find key by value
Use pop() with default to safely remove keys
Use get() with default 0 to count values
Use get() to add to existing value or start at 0
description: Practice using dictionary methods like keys(), values(), items(), update(), pop(), and setdefault().
